review: Super easy to use and set up.  Why didn't I get this sooner? Phone ap is great and there are so many things to watch.

review: Finally a firestorm that works!! After much aggravation from my first fire stick not working the new one is fantastic.
author: Holly

review: Really like my firestic because now I can watch my hulu on my big screen TV instead of on my computer. Also my Pandora music of choice and You Tube plus lots of amazon programs.

review: it kept locking up.  it never worked.
author: MICHAEL D.FARLEY

review: I think the fire stick is great for including Netflix and of course all that comes with the Amazon prime. The picture is awesome and has a solid Wi-Fi connectivaty. The only reason I don't give it five stars is because I have not been able to put vudu on it and I have spent close to $2000 in movies and still can't watch them in my bedroom. If it is possible to have the vudu app. On it please let me know and will definitely go back and give 5 stars!
author: punto de oro
